name: CPYou
description:
CPYou is an ASM based puzzle game.
You'll take control of a fictional CPU to solve 16 algorithmic challenges with a limited memory, instruction and stack space.

Released for the EE24 Open Game Compo in 2016, this is a version that improves looks and documentation, adds levels, fixes bugs and is more mobile friendly.

Click here for instructions on how to play the game.  The project is open source, you can look at the code or download/fork/modify it in this github repository.
